perc8791900-POSTED (2022-10-11):

### Solicitation Number - Numéro de sollicitation - WS3695706531

#### Solicitation Title (English) - Titre de la sollicitation en anglais - F3766-220595: Request for Proposal (RFP) - Acquisition, Delivery and Installation of Metal Storage Lockers under Category 3 of the Supply Arrangement E60PQ-140003 - [DFO] (Canadian French: Ministère des Pêches et des Océans)

---

#### Document Details - Détails du document

- **Solicitation Title (English)**: F3766-220595 RFP Acquisition, delivery and installation Metal Storage Lockers under SA E60PQ-140003 Cat 3 for [DFO]
- **Solicitation Title (French)**: F3766-220595  DDP Acquisition, livraison et installation  de Casiers de Rangement en Métal sous AMA E60PQ-140003 Cat 3 pour MPO
- **Reference Number**: WS3695706531-Doc3695734669

- **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-26T14:00:00
- **Amendment Date**: 2022-10-11
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2022-11-12
- **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-06-28
- **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
- **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré
- **Procurement Category - Categorie d'approvisionnement**: Goods (Materiaux)
- **Procurement Method - Méthode d'approvisionnement**: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

#### Requested Goods - Marchandises demandées
Lockers (Canadian French: Penderies ou casiers) ( UNSPSC: 56101520)

#### Trade Agreements - Accords commerciaux
This solicitation is covered by the following trade agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), NAFTA, CPTPP, and WTO-GPA.

#### Contact Information - Informations de contact
Julie Carbonneau at the Public Services and Procurement
